channel.title: legacy game does not install correctly
channel.description:
I recently played Half Life and then remembered Black Mesa, so decided to try it again. It worked fine back in 2012.
I installed and ran source SDK, source 2007 SDK, created a BMS folder in sourcemod, and DLed the installer. The only place I could DL from is ModDB which has the 2 part installer. So it is installed and shows as 7.06gb in size but has no .EXE. No way to run it. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling it trying different combinations 4 times now and always get the same result.
There must be something I'm missing but I do not know what it might be.

item.title: legacy game does not install correctly
item.dc:creator: miklkit
item.description:
I was extracting the zip files directly into the steamapps folder, both in and outside of the BMS folder. This did not work.

This time I extracted the files into its own folder and then moved that folder into steamapps. When I restarted steam it worked this time.

Thank you.
